recipesJson.name: Bread Pudding
recipesJson.author: MCrane81
recipesJson.description:
A delicious bread pudding with custard. 

In my honest opinion, this really does taste very authentic. The light eggy baked bread leaving a lovely sweet raisin coating on your palette with the back notes of vanilla custard. 

My favourite childhood dessert just how I remember it, but in vape form üòÅ

reviews.text: hey this is a great bread pudding mix. I did have to sub for nonna cake.  I wanna say I used deep fried pastry dough or funnel cake as a sub.  its steeped for 2 weeks and didnt take notes but I will be making more of this as you nailed the percentages!!  thanks for sharing
